name: Project Onward
description:
Welcome to the Octagon Family!

At Octagon Industries every cog in the works is vital in keeping this machine running, and with demand for Octagon's latest and most fragile product, your job has never been more important!

In this puzzle experience, you take the place of an Octagon Operator, remotly guiding a L.E.T Delivery Unit through Octagon's transfer tunnels to the closest storage warehouse. 

Unfortunatley, Octagon hasn't had the time to bring their tunnels up to saftey regulations and many hazards block your little robot's path. And did the user manual mention that the Unit is programmed to only go forward and never stop until it reaches it's destination? 

If you want the L.E.T Unit to finish their delivery without exploding, you'll need to open doors, trigger traps and drop down helpful items from your station to protect your single-minded Unit from harm.

These Units are insanely fragile, and expensive, so think of every failed assignment as you flushing three years of your wages down the drain.

No pressure, right?
